summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of the alley in block 4, Hillman City Addition, Division \#5, being the alley between Rainier Avenue and 44th Avenue South, from Juneau Street to Kenny Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 105815 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
